I wanted this for a visit to my husband's mother, who is ill.  The bracelet showed up in a completely different range of colors -- all muted light pinks and grays -- wouldn't have ordered that.  The photo I saw had rich purples and blues (which are my MIL's colors).  The photo of the item I ordered is still on my order but no longer on this product's page.  So they ran out and shipped something different?  Either way, I'm glad it happened because I was not impressed with the quality -- was like a simple craft project, so I returned.

类型: Style: To Bonus Mom - Love You Mom
评论详情: This was so beautiful. She loved the bracelet. It arrived right on time and it was exactly as the seller described. Perfect for the bonus mom in your life
I gave this bracelet to a sweet young lady for her graduation gift and she was over the moon excited! It is beautifully designed and the seller was very easy to work with. Highly recommend!

I loved how fast and responsive Btysun was throughout our correspondence. I told them I wanted my bracelets special made and Btysun was able to show me a picture of what my bracelets would look like. From the beginning till the end they were very professional, friendly , and overall welcoming.  I may have waited awhile for what I wanted, but Btysun checked on me while I was waiting for my order, giving me a heads up and staying in communication with me. I loved the whole exchange 😍 ❤ 💕  , not to mention the product itself. I felt special opening the box. Let alone my friends that are gonna be on the other receiving end of this beautiful gift. There's a card that you can write a special message to the person inside. And the gift comes in a nice pouch and box. Overall I recommend 👌 😌.
